item.description: What do you want to create? Let us start with the question.  What do you want?  Now, get that clear in your mind. Let's build your vision and focus on letting those dreams come to life. Leave with a vision board in hand and begin your path to what you want with focus and intent.  Please bring lots of pictures and sayings of  words that stand out as a dream come true for you.  If you need assistance, no problem! We will also provide magazines, and materials to help build you boards.If you are interested in creating a vision book please bring a photo album with you!  Class fee is $10 per person.
item.why: Yes this our basic class btu can I tell you how many people need to make a new board. Look at your last one. Have all those dreams come true! We have all the supplies. Just sign up and show up!!!!

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Positive Thinker's Vision Boards
